india: First Railway estalblished between Bombay and Thane
australia: First paddle steamers on Murray River on the spring flood. From South Australia, the Lady Augusta captained by Francis Cadell, reached Swan Hill while Mary Ann captained by William Randell, made it as far as Moama (near Echuca).[4]
Bendigo Petition and Red Ribbon Rebellion at Bendigo
argentina: Constitution of Argentina agreed by assembly in Santa Fe, creating modern system of government
